entry.title: Well done to all the build000rs in the @web3afrika hackathon, and special congrats to the winners 👏👏 🫡 https://twitter.com/web3afrika/status/...
entry.summary:
Well done to all the build000rs in the @web3afrika hackathon, and special congrats to the winners 👏👏 🫡 https://twitter.com/web3afrika/status/1651980108637298689
Web3 Afrika: 🔥Announcing the winners of the Web3 Afrika Hackathon! We received many amazing submissions & our judges had difficulty deciding on the top projects. Without further ado, here are the winners: 1st http://manor-cyan.vercel.app 2nd http://tipx.vercel.app 3rd http://web3afrikan-blog.vercel.app https://twitter.com/BunzzDev/status/1651966335826493441 https://t.co/C36dqY4cTa
